item.title: Floodwaters enter Hugh L. Carey Tunnel
item.description: Traffic surveillance camera shows floodwaters in the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel (Brooklyn Battery Tunnel.) #Sandy http://t.co/q3OexJeo
item.content:encoded: Traffic surveillance camera shows floodwaters in the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel (Brooklyn Battery Tunnel.) #Sandy http://t.co/q3OexJeo Floodwaters from Hurricane Sandy enter the Hugh L. Carey Tunnel (former Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel). Governor Andrew M. Cuomo ordered the tunnel closed at 2 p.m. on Monday, October 29, 2012. Photo: MTA Bridges and Tunnels Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Post-Tropical Cyclone SANDY Update Statement
item.description: And now the center of #Sandy has made landfall http://t.co/63bJcy37
item.content:encoded: And now the center of #Sandy has made landfall http://t.co/63bJcy37 SURFACE...RADAR...AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATE THAT POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE SANDY MADE LANDFALL NEAR ATLANTIC CITY NEW JERSEY AROUND 800 PM EDT...0000 UTC...WITH MAXIMUM SUSTAINED WINDS OF 80 MPH...130 KM/H. Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Post-Tropical Cyclone SANDY Update Statement
item.description: NHC 7 pm update: Center of Sandy is now located 20 miles south of Atlantic City, NJ http://t.co/YgpkRKrO
item.content:encoded: NHC 7 pm update: Center of Sandy is now located 20 miles south of Atlantic City, NJ http://t.co/YgpkRKrO AS INDICATED IN THE 5 PM DISCUSSION...SATELLITE...RADAR...AND AIRCRAFT DATA INDICATE THAT SANDY HAS CONTINUED TO LOSE TROPICAL CHARACTERISTICS. NHC IS NOW DESIGNATING SANDY AS A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE. IN ADDITION...THE MAXIMUM WINDS HAVE DECREASED SLIGHTLY AND ARE NOW NEAR 85 MPH...140 KM/H. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: noaa.gov

item.title: Hurricane SANDY Update Statement
item.description: Intermediate update statement on #Sandy -- just issued by @NHC_Atlantic http://t.co/xDR6ceDQ
item.content:encoded: Intermediate update statement on #Sandy -- just issued by @NHC_Atlantic http://t.co/xDR6ceDQ LATEST REPORTS FROM AN AIR FORCE RESERVE RECONNAISSANCE AIRCRAFT... AS WELL AS NOAA DOPPLER RADAR OBSERVATIONS...INDICATE THAT SANDY CONTINUES MOVING QUICKLY TOWARD THE NORTHWEST. ON THIS TRACK...THE CENTER OF SANDY IS EXPECTED TO REACH THE COAST OF EXTREME SOUTHERN NEW JERSEY OR CENTRAL DELAWARE WITHIN THE NEXT 3 TO 5 HOURS. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: noaa.gov

item.content:encoded: FEMA recommends Twitter to communicate about hurricane http://t.co/YhXg5TGR The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) on Monday recommended people caught in the path of Hurricane Sandy use social media to communicate in the event that the storm compromises other means of communication. Phone lines may be congested during/after #Sandy . Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Romney campaign bus to deliver supplies to storm-relief centers - The Hill's Blog Briefing Room
item.description: Romney campaign bus to deliver supplies to storm-relief centers - The Hill's Blog Briefing Room http://t.co/L0E8Q37e
item.content:encoded: Romney campaign bus to deliver supplies to storm-relief centers - The Hill's Blog Briefing Room http://t.co/L0E8Q37e Mitt Romney's campaign is using a campaign bus to collect and distribute donated supplies for those in the path of Hurricane Sandy, campaign aides said Monday. Romney was originally slated to campaign over the weekend in Virginia, but canceled plans there and joined running mate Paul Ryan in Ohio. Link - Trackbacks
